name: Evolution: Prime (Prototype)
description:
Evolution is the key to survival, but its not nature but you that decides! Watch over the Bugs as they start from the Primal bottom of the food chain. Make them faster, bigger, stronger and special! But be careful, evolution comes at a cost, as you become larger and stronger, you may become slower, unable to catch your prey.

Prime Evolution is a Prototype in rapid development, currently under one full time dev.

Join the Community over @ Bucket of Games on Discord, request a invite anytime.

Any donations will go directly to game development! You can even choose where in development they go. Want better sprites? More evolution? More maps to explore? you choose!
